PR Title Format: <type>: <short description>

Types:
- feat: New feature
- fix: Bug fix
- refactor: Code restructuring
- docs: Documentation
- chore: Maintenance
- perf: Performance
- test: Testing

Merge Commit Format (Squash and Merge):
<type>: <description> (#<PR-number>)

The PR title will become the merge commit message.
Keep it clear and descriptive!
